verses.verse: The elders <WG4245> which are among <WG1722> you <WG5213> I exhort <WG3870> <WG5719>, who <WG3588> am also an elder <WG4850>, and <WG2532> a witness <WG3144> of the sufferings <WG3804> of Moshiach <WG5547>, and also <WG2532> a partaker <WG2844> of the glory <WG1391> that shall <WG3195> <WG5723> be revealed <WG601> <WG5745>:

Feed <WG4165> <WG5657> the flock <WG4168> of 'Elohim <WG2316> which is among <WG1722> you <WG5213>, taking the oversight <WG1983> <WG5723> thereof, not <WG3361> by constraint <WG317>, but <WG235> willingly <WG1596>; not <WG3366> for filthy lucre <WG147>, but <WG235> of a ready mind <WG4290>;
Neither <WG3366> as <WG5613> being lords over <WG2634> <WG5723> 'Elohim's heritage <WG2819>, but <WG235> being <WG1096> <WG5740> ensamples <WG5179> to the flock <WG4168>.
And <WG2532> when the chief Shepherd <WG750> shall appear <WG5319> <WG5685>, ye shall receive <WG2865> <WG5695> a crown <WG4735> of glory <WG1391> that fadeth not away <WG262>.

Likewise <WG3668>, ye younger <WG3501>, submit yourselves <WG5293> <WG5649> unto the elder <WG4245>. Yea <WG1161>, all <WG3956> of you be subject <WG5293> <WG5746> one to another <WG240>, and be clothed <WG1463> <WG5663> with humility <WG5012>: for <WG3754> 'Elohim <WG2316> resisteth <WG498> <WG5731> the proud <WG5244>, and <WG1161> giveth <WG1325> <WG5719> grace <WG5485> to the humble <WG5011>.

Humble yourselves <WG5013> <WG5682> therefore <WG3767> under <WG5259> the mighty <WG2900> hand <WG5495> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, that <WG2443> he may exalt <WG5312> <WG5661> you <WG5209> in <WG1722> due time <WG2540>:
Casting <WG1977> <WG5660> all <WG3956> your <WG5216> care <WG3308> upon <WG1909> him <WG846>; for <WG3754> he <WG846> careth <WG3199> <WG5719> for <WG4012> you <WG5216>.

Be sober <WG3525> <WG5657>, be vigilant <WG1127> <WG5657>; because <WG3754> your <WG5216> adversary <WG476> the devil <WG1228>, as <WG5613> a roaring <WG5612> <WG5740> lion <WG3023>, walketh about <WG4043> <WG5719>, seeking <WG2212> <WG5723> whom <WG5101> he may devour <WG2666> <WG5632>:

Whom <WG3739> resist <WG436> <WG5628> stedfast <WG4731> in the faith <WG4102>, knowing <WG1492> <WG5761> that the same <WG846> afflictions <WG3804> are accomplished <WG2005> <WG5745> in your <WG5216> brethren <WG81> that are in <WG1722> the world <WG2889>.

But <WG1161> the 'Elohim <WG2316> of all <WG3956> grace <WG5485>, who <WG3588> hath called <WG2564> <WG5660> us <WG2248> unto <WG1519> his <WG846> eternal <WG166> glory <WG1391> by <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>, after that ye have suffered <WG3958> <WG5631> a while <WG3641>, <WG846> make <WG2675> you <WG5209> perfect <WG2675> <WG5659>, stablish <WG4741> <WG5659>, strengthen <WG4599> <WG5659>, settle <WG2311> <WG5659> you.
To him <WG846> be glory <WG1391> and <WG2532> dominion <WG2904> for <WG1519> ever <WG165> and ever <WG165>. Amen <WG281>.

By <WG1223> Silvanus <WG4610>, a faithful <WG4103> brother <WG80> unto you <WG5213>, as <WG5613> I suppose <WG3049> <WG5736>, I have written <WG1125> <WG5656> briefly <WG1223> <WG3641>, exhorting <WG3870> <WG5723>, and <WG2532> testifying <WG1957> <WG5723> that this <WG5026> is <WG1511> <WG5750> the true <WG227> grace <WG5485> of 'Elohim <WG2316> wherein <WG1519> <WG3739> ye stand <WG2476> <WG5758>.
The Congregation that is at <WG1722> Babylon <WG897>, elected together with <WG4899> you, saluteth <WG782> <WG5736> you <WG5209>; and <WG2532> so doth Marcus <WG3138> my <WG3450> son <WG5207>.

Greet ye <WG782> <WG5663> one another <WG240> with <WG1722> a kiss <WG5370> of charity <WG26>. Peace <WG1515> be with you <WG5213> all <WG3956> that are in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>. Amen <WG281>.
